links.*: Of the Rings of Power and the Third Age

wikitext.*:
{{ardayearheader|2950|2951|2952|2953|2954|2955|2956}}
*The [[Dark Tower]] rises again.<ref>{{S|Rings}}</ref>
*Death of [[Ruling Steward]] [[Turgon (Steward of Gondor)|Turgon]] of [[Gondor]].<ref name="South">{{App|South}}</ref>
* Last meeting of the [[White Council]]. They debate the [[Rings of Power]]. [[Saruman]] feigns that he has discovered that [[the One Ring]] has passed down [[Anduin]] to [[Belegaer|the Sea]].<ref name=ta/> 
*Saruman withdraws to [[Isengard]], which he takes as his own, and fortifies it. Being jealous and afraid of [[Gandalf]] he sets spies to watch all his movements; and notes his interest in [[the Shire]]. He soon begins to keep agents in [[Bree]] and the [[Southfarthing]].<ref name=ta>{{App|TA}}</ref><ref>{{App|Stewards}}</ref>
*[[Ecthelion II]], son of Turgon, becomes the twenty-fifth Ruling Steward.<ref name="South"/>
* Death of [[Kings of Rohan|King]] [[Fengel]].<ref name="Mark">{{App|Mark}}</ref>
* [[Thengel]], son of Fengel, becomes the sixteenth King of [[Rohan]].<ref name="Mark"/>
{{references}}
[[Category:Third Age years|2, Third Age 2953]]
